name: PLANETBALL 2000
description:
Welcome to the greatest sport in the universe: PlanetBall 2000!

Watch as two formidable planets battle head-to-head in a fierce game of survival - these contenders must attempt to fling lesser planets into each other using their gravitational pull in order to wipe out the opposing civilisation. The rules are simple: the first planet to be annihilated loses!

Two planets, at least ten billion casualties guaranteed in the process, but only one winner: tune in to PlanetBall 2000 today!

Controls:

When first running the game, you'll be asked to set the controls for both players. Unfortunately,  the game can only be played with a keyboard and there is no support for controllers.

Credits:

Made in 2 days for the "Other Worlds" game jam in Guildford. Won the jam award for best game.
